overview: Meet Bobby Davis. Today is his nineteenth birthday. He's made his wish and blew out the candles. But, Bobby isn't happy today. His one true wish has not been granted. Bobby wants 9½ inches. Join bobby on his quest for the 9½ inch cock that can fulfill all of his desires. Along the way, a few well-equipped young cocksmen stop in to help celebrate, and end up getting their wishes granted too. 9½ inches — every boy's wish.
title: 9½ Inches
